We have to get up to put our garbage bags on the curb before the trash is picked up. We have to keep everything in our garage because animals tear into the trash if we keep it outside.

I've emailed through all channels with no solutions. Calling is even worse. It's been almost 3 months with no solution. We are getting charged for a 95 gallon cart that we have yet to receive.

At this point, we have no idea what to do.

name: Glenn Blakely
text: I have been displeased with this company ever since Saraland has gone with them. They do not pick up large piles of limbs and yard debris like our last company. They are late and have a habit of leaving the empty can in the middle of your driveway. It might be ok if you live in a neighborhood, but living along a main street, it is not wise to stop your car in the street.

name: Lori Rueschenberg
text: Previous waste removal company collected bins three weeks ago. Amwaste is my neighborhood’s new removal company.  I have called six times asking for a bin as the majority of my neighbors have all received their bins. One house even received 3 bins! I called on trash collection day to tell them to see if I could have one of those but was told the trash collectors do NOT deliver bins. Each time I have called I have been told they would get a bin to me. I was told that I was a customer in good standing as my bills were up to date. I am in the process of moving and have explained that I have less than a month to move. I still don’t have a bin for my trash. What kind of waste company does not provide paying customers with trash bins!!!  I have written only a few a Google reviews but this company takes the cake for being the worst ever!

name: Benjamin Taylor
text: I will file a formal complaint to whoever is the government authority. I have lived in my new rental house 2 months and they will not respond to phone or email. It is impossible to contact them. I need to be able to get trash service and pay for it.

name: David Black
text: It is hard to rate a service that is paid for, but not provided. We wait on the phone forever just to be told, “we’ll get someone right out there” yet they never show up. They don’t respond to emails. Extremely poor customer service to match their equally poor performance. Very disappointed our trash collection changed to this company. Please do better!!

name: Jennifer Gardner
text: No communication at all and horrible service!! We requested two trash cans when we built our house and were told that they did have enough cans to give us two. So whatever, but then a few weeks later our neighbors finished their house and moved in and were given two cans 🤔   Then we set up auto pay when we called to set up service and get our can, and they pick up our cans until all of the sudden they didn’t. Call and they tell us they haven’t received a payment since a date that was before we even moved in and even got our can or set up payment. We have not received anything in the mail to tell us there was an issue until we call to question things. When we start asking how a payment was made before we even moved in, what happened to the payment that was set up when we set up service, and how we have gone this long with them picking up our trash if a payment hasn’t been made they have no idea and no answers for us. We have never had a problem with any other waste company until now. Zero communication from them and then when you have an issue because of their lack of communication they don’t care and it is just your problem to figure out!

name: Karen Williams
text: This company provided very spotty service. I had 2 day garbage and then 1 day recycle. My trash pick up was not consistent and neither was the recycle. I've called and complained several times. The last time I called they tried to tell me I only had 1 day trash pickup which was a lie. I didn't always use the Tues service but was paying for it... she said that all I had was the Fri service so they took a day away because THEIR DRIVERS ARE INCOMPETENT. I will be pursuing another company

name: janice jordan
text: Terrible company, sometimes will pick up trash other times will pass it even though I keep my bill paid up. This company collect what they are TRASH!!!!

name: paul trunec
text: It took three weeks and three phone calls for the first pick up. Now, waiting two weeks for the current one. I  would have gladly paid the increase for Advanced  Disposal.

name: JerseyGirl InAlabama

We never received any updates from Advanced Disposal that Amwaste was taking over and we for sure have not heard from Amwaste! We only found out about Amwaste because our new neighbors next door informed us that supposedly they will now service our area. We have not received our new Amwaste trash cans and Advanced Disposal have not picked up there old cans. I am turned off already and I am extremely frustrated! I will be contacting the city and commissioners office first thing Monday morning!

The drivers have been great but the administrative group leaves a lot to be desired.

I have tried four different times to submit a request for help, and each time it says oops something went wrong. I cannot get ahold of anybody to rectify the situation.

There are ups and downs with any business, but I feel like they treated me more than fair, and I would recommend them if you need garbage service.

One day we  put the wrong can out and filled it with stuff that she was throwing away. Well later the next day, I noticed that day the team didn't pick it up since it wasn't a Amwaste can. So I called and talked to Lisa. They explained that since we pay for 1 can pick up twice weekly that the guys did not pick it up because it wasnt their can. I went to my bedroom for like 10 minutes and the can was empty when I came back in the front and looked out the window. Now that is service there my friends.

Do not do business with these people you will definitely regret it if you do.

name: Michael “Miggles” Migas
text: I pay for both debris and recycling pickup once per week. They come about every other week. The regular trash doesn't always get picked up either.

name: Autumn Demeranville
text: We have been with them since September. We experienced some of the things people are complaining about, but I understood they were getting used to a new route and customers. We received a friendly letter apologizing for the late recycling pick up. Explanation was the response was larger than they expected and had to make adjustments. Haven't had problems in weeks. They do handle Holiday pick up differently than the last company I used. I don't really know when they are going to pick up on a Holiday week, but other than that no real complaints.

name: A. A. Gapud
text: Doing a search for a phone number for this company, I happened to notice all these bad reviews, and felt compelled to say something positive. Perhaps I'm living in an alternate universe from everyone else, or maybe there's been some changes, but we've had nothing but positive experiences with this company. Our account is a residential weekly pickup of recyclables and garbage, and we switched to them last Fall 2019 because we were really taken by their salesman -- probably not the salesperson described in some of these reviews. Since then, we've had reliable pickup every single week, including holidays. Every time I had a billing question over the phone, I received great service (special shoutout to "Tori") and pleasant conversation. This current week was the only time they missed a pickup, and a call to Tori clarified that, not surprisingly, they are not picking up recyclables because of the current pandemic. Really sorry about the bad experience the others have received: We've had bad service from previous waste collection companies before, so I totally understand. But we've been happy with our service so far, and even highly recommend them.

name: John Cleverdon
text: Service was supposed to start on Tuesday, Sept. 6th.  Pick ups on Tuesdays and Fridays, recycling on Wednesdays.  Because of Labor day, I was told (by a neighbor) they were running a day behind, didn't find out until after they didn't pick up my trash that week.  Then the next week only picked up on Wednesday because I called after they didn't pick up on Tuesday.  Then they didn't pick up on Friday.  I called and left a message that it wasn't picked up.  When I called today (Monday) to make sure it was going to be picked up as scheduled, was told my contract was closed, and that I had called and left a message that I wanted to cancel my contract.  I didn't do that.  Was told they would re-open my account, and my trash would be picked up as scheduled.  I guess I'll see.  Maybe I should have left it cancelled and gone back to my old company.  They didn't do recycling, but at least they did what they said they would do - pick up my trash twice a week.

name: BRAD WALKER
text: Poor customer service good luck on getting your debris  or trash picked if I could give leass the 1 star I would

text: They are supposed to pick up on Tuesday... today is Thursday and they still haven’t picked up the trash. This happens at least once a month.

name: Jessica Whitney

I’ve called over and over and told I would hear back from a manager and never did. I’ve been hung up on just becuase they don’t want to hear me out... don’t waste your time or money

I have a question for Amwaste: What person in their right mind would sign up for service with your company, when the people you employ is disrespectful? I will never do business with this company. I wish I could give a zero star.

text: Terrible customer service. Moved and didn't restart service for 2 quarters. They are trying to charge me for the 2 quarters that I did not receive any service from them before I can restart. They are a monopoly in rural areas and know people have no other options.

They only picked us up ONCE and then missed us every subsequent week. It took weeks to get a hold of someone in order to cancel, and they wouldn't refund me for the months I had paid for that I wouldn't be using. Do not use this company!!

name: Noir Gold
text: BEWARE OF THIS COMPANY-HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! Waited on hold for over an hour, second time- over 45 minutes..... When I finally got through to there customer service department- The lady had a horrible attitude and hung up in my face twice. I have never received this type of disrespect to this level. But I see others have ran into the same issue so I’m not surprised.

name: Lennon Steadham
text: Amwaste has been a nightmare. We bought in to the promises of recycling pickup when they sent their scavenger around to solicit our neighborhood. We  immediately regretted our decision after reading their reviews and called to cancel the service before it even began. They have absolutely zero customer service over the phone. I called no less than 20 times over the course of a day to FINALLY get a very aggravated woman on the phone who said our service would not be started. A week later and we have their can sitting in our front yard with, once again, no communication for them to come pick it up. We’re so glad that our current trash provider was understanding and made sure to not change our current service. Don’t. Waste. Your. Time. They get one star because google forces you to give at least one.

name: Herbert Miller
text: They make a living by stealing your money and not providing the services  they promised. This is the second week my trash wasn’t picked up.

name: brett
text: This sketchy company has begun price gouging small, reliable garbage companies that have been operating in southern AL for 50 years. They go door to door (even when told not to or when people have no soliciting signs in their yard) and tell people they'll pick up twice a week, which if you look at their website for 2 seconds, they only pick up once a week everywhere else. Seems like an obvious ploy just to get people to switch. Don't buy into the shady sales tactics. I've heard of them pre-filling out their cancellation cards before, and even saying that they'll send out the cancellation cards for you causing people to literally be afraid this company is going to try to cancel their other garbage pickup service. I know on the surface an *initially* cheaper and *initially* more frequent garbage service that's coming into town may seem attractive, but remember to stop and think about what they stand to gain from you, and to research if they actually hold up what they promise in other areas. There's a reason that certain companies in this area have been around for literally 5 decades, and it was done by building a clientele through RELIABLE, FAIR PRICING slowly instead of lying to people about services / going door to door price gouging other companies until they raise the prices after those companies go out of business.

name: Scott Angus
text:
Opps...we made a big mistake changing to Am Waste. Our contract began August 2nd for pick up on Friday and Tuesday. They came Friday August 2nd, then it was Wednesday August 7th not Tuesday the 6th. Last time they picked up was late Saturday August 10th, not Friday as contracted and nothing this week. I called Thursday August 15th and was told that the gal on the phone would get a hold of the Supervisor and have someone come out. Now it is Saturday, I have an over-flowing can by the street and no sign of an Am Waste truck at all.

I want our money back so we can go back to a reliable service and I must warn you...DON'T DO BUSINESS WITH THIS COMPANY!!! THEY DO NOT HONOR THEIR CONTRACTS!!!

name: Matthew Booth
text: This company is an absolute joke. Called one day after signing on with their service to cancel because I read the reviews after I signed up on July 10th. Called the 11th to cancel. Called the 15th to confirm to find out that they had not cancelled. I wasn't getting off the phone until it was cancelled. Called back on the 30th to find out where my refund was and was told that they processed refunds at the beginning of the month. Just called today August 12th, one month after cancelling, still no refund. I was told that they didn't have a refund request on file. What kind of company has a separate refund request AFTER you cancel the service. This company needs to be put to the curb. Please don't sign up for this service! It will only bring you a massive headache.

name: Lisa Walker
text:
I’m only giving 1 star bc you have to in order to review. Yes the young man came to our door to solicit business. Due to the lower cost of the service we agreed to switch. This was on Thursday June 6. However my husband and I both had a change of heart and decided to stick to the service we’ve had for over a year with NO PROBLEMS. We have 3 business days to cancel per the contract. I canceled on Monday June 10. I was told they wouldn’t cash the check they were given and they’d send it back. Surprise!! They cashed it and after almost a month of the runaround from calling I was just told “they’ll issue the checks by the end of the month”. So here it is July 8th and I’m so grateful we actually didn’t switch bc their customer service is awful. I don’t have any problems with American Waste Solutions. Don’t be fooled by the “we’re cheaper” pitch. We decided the grass wasn’t greener on the other side and decided to stay with our current provider!  I want my $57 back and I will keep in them until I receive it. Again don’t be fooled just bc you wanna save $$.

****Follow up***. Here it is August 16 and I’ve yet to receive a call back from JUNE!!! I guess I’m let the BBB in on this transaction. It’s not even about the $57 even tho it’s NOT THEIRS!!!  I got a lady  today and she said they received the request in 8/5. Don’t make me get out my phone records and show you where I been calling since June. STAY CLEAR OF THIS DREADFUL  BUSINESS!!! You’ve been warned.

FINAL UPDATE:  Today 8/19/19 we FINALLY received our refund today!! It’s dated 10 days ago and no one has ever called back. I called again this morning for the office manager and I think it’s a safe bet  that she ( Mary Ann) ISNT gonna call me back but this nightmare is now OVER!! Good luck to anyone else in the same boat we were in.

name: Mrs.

resp.text: This definitely was a first Christin but you've given us some ideas for future Vdays! We are happy you enjoyed the service.

name: Brian Blevins
text:
If you need to rent a dumpster at a reasonable price to clean out your garage or do spring cleaning, give them a call. They have dumpsters in various sizes and can assist you in finding the right size for your needs. Also great for remodeling projects too! The rental is for 7 days, so you can take your time and includes free drop-off and pickup. They will even place wood boards on the ground to avoid damage to you driveway or yard before placing the dumpster on top!

Their customer service is outstanding and will work with you to make sure you are happy with your rental. If you need to keep the dumpster for a extra day or two, they can arrange that too. One call is all it takes. Their prices cannot be beat and no one can match their customer service. They are one of the very few companies I enjoy doing business with. I will recommend them to family and friends if they ever require a dumpster rental! Give them a call!

resp.text: Thank you Brian for the awesome review and we appreciate you!

name: Chisty Reach
text: Absolutely wonderful! I got exactly what I needed when I needed it at a very competitive price. There were no hidden fees which I loved. I highly recommend them. No complaints!

resp.text: Thank you Christy!! We appreciate your feedback !!

text: DELIVERED ON TIME, OFFICE PEOPLE VERY FREINDLY AND PROFESSIONAL. PRICE BEST I HAVE FOUND. WILL USE THIS COMPANY FOR ALL MY JOBS IN THEIR COVERAGE AREA.   THANK YOU FOR GREAT SERVICE

text: Great experience overall. They showed up when they promised and the driver even called to make sure the bin was left in the correct spot. I called their office with questions about what could be placed in the bin and the phone was even answered by a real person. Very professional company!

text: This was the easiest thing ever.  I marked the driveway where I wanted it.  They left it there and they came and picked it up as scheduled.  Nothing to sign when delivered.  It was just there until they picked it up.

resp.text: It was our pleasure! We appreciate you supporting our locally owned business!

name: Keith Davis
text: I had been put in a very unfair position of being asked to leave a rental house that I had been in for over six years, Never been late on rent payment and increased the value of the owners home, due to the upkeep of the yard. I was called and told I would have to find somewhere else to live, and be out in 60 or so days. I was working on a seemingly impossible deadline and when I called Bin There Dump That, The woman that answered the phone was incredibly helpful, understanding and kind. She said they could have it delivered as soon as I wanted, she gave me the rates which I thought were very reasonable and said if anything changed just to give her a call and let her know. The bin was delivered on time, very clean and ready to use. The guy who delivered it was very helpful in showing me how everything worked and letting me know the details of what to do. When it came to the last day, I made a phone call and ask if there was a possibility that I could have it one extra day and they accommodated with no problems. I can’t say enough about the staff. Everyone that I have dealt with that has anything to do with Bin There Dump That, has been above my expectations, very accommodating and extremely professional. I will recommend them to anyone who asks. I could not be more pleased. Thank you for being what a business needs to be.! Outstanding!!

resp.text: Thank you Keith!!! We appreciate you!!!

name: Debbie Holland
text: If I could give this company a rating over 5 stars, I would. We have used them twice this year and have another dumpster scheduled for delivery in a few days.  Everyone, I mean everyone, is professional, friendly, and courteous. They are very easy and flexible to work with and we have encountered zero issues.  I highly recommend you give them a call to see for yourself. Our purpose for using this company: emptying a large house and thankful Bin There Dump That has been able to assist.

resp.text: Thank you Debbie!! We appreciate you so much !

name: Michael Kelley
text: Of the Local dumpster folks I have worked with over the last several years and I have work with a couple thanks to the April Tornado 2011, and then most recently, Bin there Dump That. text: Called these clowns again by mistake. Wanted junk moved on a Saturday. I was "long distance from the sacred headquarters." Extra charge. Set up the appointment. No show. Cats couldn't read a map. Couldn't find the place was their story. Look at my next review to learn about cool cats who can read a map. College Hunks was nice enough to set up an appointment for Sunday. Surprised me. They called Sunday morning to tell me that they didn't have an empty truck. Couldn't show up, could I reschedule. I said no. Then it dawned on me. I called the wrong company. I called the idiots. That's on me. Two appointments, two no shows.  $599 was their quote because I was long distance. Check out my next review for how you don't ever want to deal with these morons.

name: Brittany Wood (bwooderp)
text:
I have never been SO frustrated with a company that I left an angry voicemail, but College Hunks Hauling Junk and Moving has proved that I am capable of doing so.

I had a Junk Removal Service appointment with a scheduled window of 1-3pm today. Per the appointment confirmation email, I was expecting a phone call “20-30 minutes before [my] scheduled arrival time to let [me] know when [they’ll] be there”; so, when I hadn’t received a phone call, text, or email by 1pm, I dialed the phone number provided on the appointment confirmation email.

The woman I spoke with confirmed that my appointment was correctly scheduled with my given phone number and address, and she suggested that if I don’t hear from the drivers within 20-30 minutes, to call them back.

Time passed, and at 1:30pm I called again, this time dialing the local number provided on the website. Again, I was redirected to customer service, but this time the man put me on hold to contact the local Huntsville office for further inquiry. The man returned to my call and stated the Huntsville office did not answer, so he had left a voicemail. He suggested to wait out the duration of my appointment window, and that it’s rare to have a no-show.

3:00 PM, no-show. I am beyond frustrated. I call again. Connected with customer service again, this time with a man named Bernard. Again, he offered to call the local office, but I told him that had been done already and I was not receiving any feedback on what was going on. I asked him for the number of the local office so that I could call them myself, and apparently this is not normally allowed and requires supervisor approval ??? He went ahead and left a voicemail with the local office during my time on hold, and once back on the line, he let me know he had received supervisor approval to give me the name and number of the manager at the Huntsville/Madison office.

How interesting that within 4 MINUTES of me leaving my honest voicemail that I received a phone call from the manager, John Smith. He apologized, said his drivers were hours behind on appointments “probably due to flooding”, that “their phones all probably died” and he wasn’t able to contact them and his hands were tied. I let him know that plenty of the reviews I had since read of his company were incredibly negative, so this situation most likely wasn’t due to flooding.

HE HAD THE AUDACITY TO INTERRUPT ME. “Well we have plenty of positive reviews-“ I told him I wasn’t interested in further service and hung up.

I warned him that I would be sharing my negative experience across all social media platforms, and I’m looking into filing a claim with BBB as well.

name: Susan Duthie
text: I love College Hunks Hauling Junk and Moving.  They have helped me with two large moves, and two more times in between the large moves, with moving furniture from one floor to another, putting together beds, and helping me move stuff to the back door for a local charity to pick up.  They have ALWAYS been very nice and patient, from the owner, John, the manager, Eliot, to all the different movers.  Our last move in October, 2017, Mike, Jeremy, and David were very careful with our furniture, and they spoke to us very politely, and they never lost their composure and positive attitude during our 8 hour move.  I will continue to recommend College Hunks to everyone, along with continuing to use them for all of our moving needs.  They never disappoint.  Thank you very much, College Hunks Hauling Junk and Moving.

name: Katherine Wolfe
text: First time I used them,really nice guys, showed up on time and we're very professional.  Not a problem.  Second time, no show no call, who I talked to was  in Florida and could not get an answer from the store here to find out why they didn't show or call.  I got my money back and called Two Men and a truck.  I will never use College Hunks again.  I see a lot of negative reviews.  Unprofessional.

name: Diane Neustadter
text: College Hunks comes through. We needed to move a hot tub down a steep, narrow driveway. They sent four men, including the manager because he said he "wanted to be sure it was done right!" They balanced the tub on multiple furniture dolleys and slowly walked it down the drive. They were so efficient, the entire move (loading, travel, unloading) took only one-fourth the estimated time. We were thrilled to have the job done so quickly and carefully... and at a lower cost than expected.

name: Linda Knowles
text: Devin and Blake were a joy to work with.  These two young men didn't waste any time and worked with a happy attitude.  They made quick work of the move and were very open to every suggestion I had which made me feel really good.  They did it "my way" and I didn't stress at all.  I will definitely use them again should the need arise.  Great job Guys; Thanks!

name: Travis Newby
text:
I recommend you avoid College Hunks for a whole house move. We had quite a few issues...

1. They called the day before our multi-truck, 2 day move and told us they didn’t have us on the schedule to drop off, and would we mind our stuff being a day late. Having two children and nowhere to go, I did mind. (To be fair, their reaction and patience to what I had to say about this was far better than mine.)

2. When they movers did show up, they were nice and worked hard. But they were not professional movers. They won’t totally wrap your furniture. You will have dings and nicks. They won’t respect your hardwoods or your doors.

3. When they dropped the furniture off, they did it with only 2 people. We have heavy hardwood furniture and this created a VERY dangerous situation for their workers, me (who had to help), and my furniture. And in fact, a heavy dresser tipped off the ramp and almost crushed one of their workers. If I were him, I’d have stopped work and demanded more workers come.

Because of all these things, I think you’re better off with a more professional moving company for whole house moves.

name: Shanna Ndong
text: Unprofessional! I requested a quote on their website. Within 30 minutes someone from Hunks called me for additional information. I spent 30 minutes answering questions about my move, but because my move includes packing I was told that I needed an in-person inventory. I scheduled it for the next morning (a Saturday). Instead of someone showing up for the quote as promised, I received a call from someone with Hunks saying they needed an inventory over the phone. I explained that I was told someone would come by to do the quote. The woman replied, “that’s just the call center”. (What?!) I said I provided a lot of information yesterday and she again said “I just need an inventory of your stuff. We only come out for haul-away or when there’s more than 2000 sq ft”. I told her I’m moving to a 3500 sq ft house. She replied “I need to know what you have now at your current place”. I told her I live in a 3 bedroom apt and we have 2 full storage units. My move qualifies as greater than 2000 sq ft. She replied, “I just need an inventory”. I told her I’d go with someone else and hung up. Poor attitude and poor customer service. That’s not how you run a business. They should honor what their call center tells customers even if it’s a Saturday.

name: Richard Sparks
text: I am a disabled veteran who recently built on to my house. I needed assistance to move all the old furniture into the garage so new flooring could be installed. I could not have asked for two more professional caring people as Larry & Devin. They moved 2400 Sq Ft into the garage in 3 Hrs and 45 Minutes. The were even creative in figuring out how to remove my granddaughter's trampoline from the great room and get it through all the door ways to the outside. Professionalism - 5 Stars; Pride in Work - 5 Stars; Knowledge of work - 5 Stars; Overall - 5 Stars. Great experience and I have requested these guys back next week to move it all back after the carpet is installed. Thank you so much for providing a great service to our community.

name: William Neville
text:
My movers MIKE, Ryan,Nick and Lucas were awesome!  Very courteous.  Moved everything where we needed it moved.  They were very careful not to damage the walls or furniture.  Great job guys!!!
As a customer it ended up costing more than we anticipated but we had a lot of loose items and they had to add a guy.  I'd recommend getting 4 guys it will cost you less in the end.

name: Jeff Bosonetto
text: This rating should be a NEGATIVE 1,000,000 Stars.  These movers are completely incompetent and unprofessional.  They dropped my $2500 900lb safe off their truck after telling me that they could move it even though they had the wrong equipment and not enough guys.  Their resolution was a measly $500 to replace the safe that is now out of warranty due to 100% of their incompetence, plus they failed to put it where it was supposed to go. When I confronted the owner on his inadequate resolution, the owner laughed and said that something will always get broken on every move so I should have bought insurance.  Really?!  A 900lb safe is not a box of china. So what he is saying is that they are so pathetic at what they do that they WILL break something on every move, and its on you.  Use these immature, unprofessional children at your own risk.   There is no doubt that this pathetic company will be out of business shortly and their owner will be back to flipping burgers.  Now, I'm going to hire real movers to finish their job and we'll let the court system decide exactly how much they are going to pay me.

text: I give the movers 5 stars. They were very professional and super hard working guys. They called and arrive right on time. However my issue was with team that arranged the move. I specifically asked for a truck with a lift gate and that was no what arrived. My move involved heavy data center computer hardware.  I also was quoted one price and charged another because Friday is considered a 'weekend'.

text: I totally agree with everyone else who has given the College Hunks five stars.  So courteous, so punctual.  They showed up exactly as scheduled and completed the job perfectly.  I'm one happy customer and won't hesitate to use them again in the future.

text: Great guys, super hard workers and very nice. Managed to fit an entire house inside a PODS. I was so worried it wasnt all going to fit, but they stacked everything so well! Excellent service. I will definitely use them again and recommend them to my friends and family.

text:
College Hunks moved appliances (refrigerator, stove, dishwasher and microwave) and household goods to a charitable organization for me. These guys arrived early, moved items quickly and nothing in my home was nicked, damaged or bothered. The estimates I was given was accurate: I wasn’t charged extra for movers or the company trying to exceed my estimated cost. A manager came with the Hunks to my residence for overnight: very professional and astute. I’ve used 2 Men and a Truck, Allied Movers, Northern Van Lines: after using College Hunks in Huntsville, AL; I’ll never use any of the above named companies again. These young gentlemen are in college and want to work: today’s youth isn’t geared in this direction. I’m proud to have met these fine young gentlemen with a work ethic I admire. Thank you as a company: most of all I thank the crew who eagerly assisted me.

Sincerely

Teri Carlisle

text: We needed help moving a treadmill and found these guys. They arrived promptly and moved it with ease! I highly recommend them for any job you need help with. If I need help again, they will be my first choice! Thanks again!

name: NitaBillS Schmidt
text: Roberto and Nick showed up on time, called to say they would be there about 15 minutes before they arrived.  They were courteous, professional, and fast.  We could not have done it without them.  They both deserve a raise!   Thank you so much.

name: Alisa Breen
text: Very quick and professional moving! Took a lot of care with my items and two very nice men. Thank you so much for your help!

name: Stacie M
text: College Hunks did a fantastic job moving a piano that I inherited from a family member. Mike and Marius showed up on time, worked quickly and efficiently, and moved the piano from Huntsville to Madison with no damage to the piano or either house. We were definitely pleased with this service and would use College Hunks again in the future!

name: Lora Cason
text: This is my experience with college hunks removal. After rescheduling twice you finally showed up to get your truck stuck in my driveway.  Your drivers used my landscaping rocks to attempt to move the truck and then threw them in my grass. After two hours a tow truck came to move the truck. Then your truck drove away without removing the furniture that needed removing because I had new furniture coming.  After calling the local Huntsville AL office they said they did not have time in their schedule to come back this week. This left me in a bind but ‘we haul junk’ came through later that day. I am so disappointed in the unprofessionalism i encounter with your company. I can assure you it was NOT STRESS FREE.

name: Isabel Evans
text: Very courteous and on time.  They were quick and packed the truck in a way that required the least amount of space possible.  Wonderful experience!

name: Drey Marlow
text: Absolutely 5 stars! Ameen and Jacob were quick and efficient! They beat the quote by 2 hours! They took extra care of my antique furniture and wrapped everything right. They took the time to ask me where I wanted the furniture in the new house. Would recommend 10/10 times!

name: D Igou
text: Chunk Junk was the best experience!  They were courteous, prompt, fair in their price, and the best part was the man handling our old 600 pound television from upstairs and out to their truck!  Couldn't have done it without them and we are so glad Chunk Junk exists!

name: Nathan Ford
text:
Mike and Mariuus did a fantastic job moving my family and me. Our house too longer than budgeted and actually took an extra trip. They were happy to do everything necessary to ensure we were totally happy.

We all had a great time working together. My two year old daughter has been asking where they went after they finished!

My only critique of Hunks was the estimation process. Felt a little rushed and I got conflicting info from the local and corporate systems.

name: Laura Priest
text: I could not have been any happier with my experience using College Hunks. I called for a quote at 2pm and they were at my house at 5:30pm that evening. Roberto and Jalen were incredibly respectful and they were so fast. They had our entire garage cleaned out in 1.5 hours. I would highly recommend this crew for the removal of junk or moving services. I also love that the workers are in college and if they receive a positive rating a portion of your total goes towards their tuition and books!!

name: russell lane
text: Mike and Devin were top notch, A+ guys! They were eager to get the job done, had a great attitude and work ethic, and moved A LOT of furniture and other household items FAST! Highly recommend these 2 for your next move.

name: Brianna Clark
text: I have used this service before and was pleased prior to this event. This time I used College Hunks the staff was very unprofessional. At times  one of the movers carried a pillow at a time to my moving pod. Both movers decided to place my solid oak table on top of boxes clearly marked fragile. Overall, there was a complete disregard for items marked fragile.  I expected more efficient work and attention to detail from the movers.

name: Tony Spinelli
text: Mike and Brian were extremely professional and got the job done quickly and safely. I would absolutely recommend these guys any time. I was in a bind and needed quick response, and they did not disappoint.

name: W W
text: Nothing but an excellent & easy experience from making the call to paying for my junk removal! The call & scheduling my estimate was a breeze. I love how you aren't obligated to pay unless you say, "Do the job." Eliot & Aaron came out & gave me an estimate which I felt was fair & they got to work. They were both very polite & accomodating to my needs and finished the job quickly. It was money well-spent as it saved me time & the headache of trying to figure out how I was going to remove the junk and where to take it. I highly recommend using College Hunks for your junk removal!!

name: Angela Howald
text: Erika is great to work with for scheduling and estimates.  Roberto and Nathan arrived early, were professional and efficient.  They moved my office quickly and without any damage.  I was very happy.

name: Karen Lee
text: Devin, Mike and David were AWESOME!! My move was difficult with numerous very heavy antiques and fragile pieces and collectibles. They carefully wrapped my furniture and got my things from house to house undamaged. They were real sports when I had them move furniture around after it was where I thought it was suppose to be! They are my team for future moves!

name: Kate Carson
text: Loved these guys! Quick, professional and helped easy to set up. Will definitely work with them again!

name: Rand Childs
text: The experience was excellent.  Very easy to schedule.  Truck arrived on time and the guys hauling away our old junk did an excellent job.  Glad Huntsville has this service!

name: Mary Cummings
text: The best men ever!  Second time with Michael Baker. They were on time courteous and very professional. I’ll call for them when I need movers again.

name: Ed Preston
text: Fast, friendly, courteous and professional service. Devin and Shannon did an outstanding job. We're there in time, took care of my furniture (even a huge 1800s antique piano) and made sure everything was exactly where I wanted it before they left. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Alexandra Griffin
text: Somehow they can’t do any moving in Madison (????) and when their “home advisor” connected me to a very expensive alternative, I then proceeded to get spammed with multiple emails a day from the Home Advisor. When I unsubscribed, it takes up to TEN DAYS for changes to take affect?? You can subscribe me immediately but not unsubscribe me? Terrible knock off of We Chunk Junk.

name: Kathy Rupert
text: The two gentlemen that came to get our junk were friendly and professional. This is the second time we have used this service and are very happy. We will use it again.

name: Melani Trexler Mooneyham
text: We had a great moving experience and are very thankful for the wonderful job that Shannon, Steve and Jo did for us!  We are thankful for their hard work and professionalism!  Keep up the great work guys!

name: CECILLE SAINSBURY
text: Wow, what a positive experience.   So efficient and courteous, probably, best contractor experience leading up to this move.  Highly recommend College Hunks Hauling Junk.

name: Christy Sanders
text: Would definitely use again! I had a company storage unit that had to be cleaned out and the guys were on time and super nice

name: Barb Benjamin
text: These guys were great! Professional, polite, on time and very helpful. Give them a call!

name: Patty Sykstus
text: Great experience!  Timely, hard working, friendly and priced reasonably.  Couldn't have asked for more!  Would definitely use them again!!

name: Myra Schroeder
text: Our move was a nightmare as most moves are but College hunks was the only positive in this entire move.  I do not say this lightly as we had tire problems with our rental trucks we had breakdowns etc.  College hunks were very patient and accommodating as we had to change our times a couple times due to the breakdowns. They were always there for us, called us many times to make sure everything was OK not to pressure us mind you and we’re so polite and very caring of our household goods. Their district leader even showed up to see what he could do when he realized all of our household goods were put on the truck carelessly and many things broken. All this was due to the company Penske hired to move all our household goods once the breakdown occurred.  My husband and I will never hire any other company if we need anything done we’re moving is concerned. I highly recommend them to anyone at all because we worked with them in Florida and worked with a different group of them in Alabama when we moved and in both states the company and its people were the same. College hunks in Alabama was wonderful and we will hire them again when we finally find a home.

name: Arlene LaFrance
text: They were friendly,  curtious and completed the task quickly. I would definitely use this service again.

name: Sarah Matthews
text: These guys saved the day and helped make my move possible  and timely.  THANKS SO MUCH

name: Steve Reed
text: Drake and Marius were our movers.  Great experience!  They were very professional, courteous, and responsive.  I would move with College Hunks again.  Thanks!!

name: Jeff Tate
text: We had a great move today with Mike & Maruius with College Hunks in Huntsville.  They were extremely professional and treated our items like they were their own.  We will certainly use them again for future moves!

name: matthew clemons
text: Great experience. Maruius and Lucas were fast, professional, and very polite. I will always use College Hunks for moving and would highly recommend to anyone.

name: Susan Spencer
text: Fantastic experience. The movers were experienced and did a great job.

name: Jonathan Walker
text: Michael and Tamar were quick, efficient and arrived during my scheduled window. Price was close to expected and both of them were nice and friendly.

name: Scott Dennis
text: They did a great job and made sure we got items where they were supposed to go.

name: Jo Ellen Reid
text: Great experience, could not have asked for more polite and respectful folks.

name: Walt Schumacher
text: Roberto and Remson were friendly and efficient.  They got rid of a bunch of my trash, and also helped me move some furniture.  Great job!

name: Christy Tate
text: Mike & Maruius were professional and  courteous.  They took extra care with our belonging and went above and beyond to make sure they did not damage anything in our new home.  I would recommend Mike & Maruius and College Hunks in Huntsville for anyone looking to move in the area.

name: Tom Zebal
text: I asked for furniture movers... I got the junk haulers... In fact one of the guys told me "this is the first time I have moved furniture for a customer who was moving, I usually just do the junk removal".. They were HORRIBLE on my furniture and the walls & doors of my home as they moved the furniture... Claim filed.. NEVER again.

name: Terri Knight
text: Great communication. DeForrest and AJ  were Great! Thanks for the help.

name: Caron Sykes
text: Very easy and affordable. Great service!

name: P S
text: Great communication. Efficient and friendly. Highly recommend.

name: Kim Coulter
text: Michael and Christian were so helpful. And did a great job.

name: Tiffany Taylor
text: In three separate moving days, the team was a minimum of 45 minutes late for arrival, with one of those days being hours late. With initial discussions we were quoted and paid for a team of 6, but on moving day only 3 were there, 1 of whom spent most of his time in the truck rather than helping move. After a sight visit and quote, we were told we would be cutting it close with 1 truck but that she thought we could get it all. So to ensure we would be okay, my husband and I rented, loaded and moved a 12 foot covered trailer from uhaul in advance. But they still couldn't fit it all in the truck. We have had to haul another 15 foot uhaul truck plus will have to make several more loads in our SUV or pickup to get the rest. No one in the company has been apologetic in the least, and in fact have responded rudely, untruthfully, and completely inappropriately to our petition for their consideration of the inconveniences that their misquote has caused us... Oh, and by the way, their inability to properly drive a truck resulted in relatively significant damage to our property. At first, my husband and I were willing to overlook their errors and their incompetence, however their dishonesty is what has resulted in this post. In our opinion, this is not a company that values integrity.

name: D Benel
text: Great experience! Mike and Nick were polite, professional and accomplished my moving efficiently.

name: sharon davis
text: Very professional, curious and considerate of your home. Thanks

name: Vicky B
text: Maruius and Mike were extremely professional movers!  I would highly recommend them for big or small moves!

name: Jakeyah Williams
text: Aiden😎 was the best guy for the job 😊😊😊. Truly a young professional and all around friendly little guy!!!

name: Phaedra Dugan
text: Mike B and Joseph did a great job moving some large fragile antiques.  Very professional and on time.  Thanks!!

name: Russell Finch
text: Friendly, efficient and well worth the price

name: Summer Smith
text: Great guys that do a great job! Thanks College Hunks Huntsville!

name: Kent White
text: Mike and Maruius were efficient, polite, and gentle with our furniture.  What a good experience!

name: Robert Kelley
text: Jalen and Roberto did a great job.

name: Jake Hill
text: Highly recommend for junk disposal.

name: Sara McNair
text: Wonderful experience and wonderful people!

name: EP Breeze
text: Roberto and Javier moved the contents of our Mom's apartment and took them to a charity for us. Our Mom had passed away suddenly and emptying her apartment was filled with emotion.  These young men were professional and extremely compassionate of our situation.  We would highly recommend them for any type of move.

name: David Browning
text: Could not have been happier. We had David & Maurius help us with the initial move and asked for them specifically for the second part of the move.

name: Amir Razani
text: Very professional. Thanks for the help!

name: Anthony Draper
text: On time and very professional!

name: Jill Upchurch
text:
The guys were very professional, careful, and fast!!! Very pleasant experience!  They even were able to come the same day and help
me re-arrange and remove some furniture  I will use them again.

name: Josh Norton
text:
This company is absolute garbage. Their employees are inexperienced, clumsy, and unable to handle simple problems. If you have an issue, you will be directed to some call center down in Tampa, FL, who are absolutely incompetent as well. The Call Center can, and will only, call the local franchise owner to express your complaint. This franchise owner, never reaches out to his customers, despite the fact that my wife and I both got his cell phone number and left numerous messages.

Now on to what actually happened.

My wife's parents recently moved and we needed to move her piano out of their house, so we hired College Hunks to move the piano. We expressly told them that it was to move a piano and that was the only thing that needed to be moved.

The scheduled day approaches. They said they would be there at 4:30. When 5:30 eventually rolled around, so did they. ((Strike One))

They then moved the piano out of the house and down the first step for a total of about 15 feet. Then for some inexplicable reason, could not move it any further. Not only that, but it was ONLY THEN that they realized that they had no way of getting the piano up on their truck. So they came to a job knowing that they were going to move a piano without the proper equipment and without enough people.

Then comes the worst part of all. Instead of moving the Piano back inside where they originally moved it from. THEY LEFT IT OUTSIDE!

They Left the damn piano and said that they would be back tomorrow!

Wait, it gets better.....

The next day rolls around and again they say they will be there between 3:30 and 4:30. Well, 5:30 comes and goes and still no word from these stooges. That is when my wife and I started calling that call center and reaching out to the Franchise Owner and even the guy driving the truck.

They said they were running late and would be there at 6:30. We then asked them if they had a different truck or additional equipment. They told us what they were bringing and IT WAS EXACTLY WHAT THEY HAD THE DAY BEFORE.

7:00 PM comes along and still no word. We call that Call Center again, and this time they tell us that they had to reschedule and that they would be there the following day, which would have left this piano OUTSIDE for TWO Days!

I finally had enough of these inept morons and called up someone who also owned a moving service. He was able to get out to the house the following morning and move the thing in less than an hour.

To sum up:

This company absolutely sucks. Incompetent Employees + Incompetent Ownership and Service. They left my wife's piano OUTSIDE for TWO Days before we finally had enough of their nonsense and hired another company.

I will never use College Hunks again, nor will anyone that I know.

After I am done with this review, I will actually be looking into filing a claim against these morons for the scratches that they also put on the piano during their re-enactment of a Monty Python Sketch.

name: Jared Leader
text: This was our first time using a moving service and I was blown away with the amazing quality of service. Mark, Andrew, and Ja'mon were fantastic. They were professional, knowledgeable, and worked really well together as a team. Not only did they get the job done in a timely fashion; they also went out of their way to make sure our stuff was well taken care of. I will definitely be using this moving service again and requesting these three!

name: James Luker
text: Very friendly and efficient. Got the job done quickly. Price was great. 5 stars.

name: Courtney Evans
text: Very unprofessional. The college 'hunks' were very rude. As well as almost running us and our vehicle over. Very very childish. Please dont waste your time with this company.

name: Deborah Jones
text: I'm really satisfied with their service. They arrived an hour earlier than expected which was great! I was given a call beforehand to see if this was ok. They made short work of hauling out my junk and the team leader Eddie was very courteous and pleasant. The price was $250 lower than another junk hauling company in the area. I will be using them again for my moving needs later this month.

name: Clay Brooks
text: BRIAN, LUKE, AND MARK WERE SO GREAT THE ENTIRE TIME. IT RAINED ON THEM ALL MORNING BUT THEY WERE SO KIND AND HELPFUL DURING THE WHOLE MOVE AND NEVER HAD A BAD ATTITUDE. I AM EXTREMELY HAPPY WITH HOW WELL THEY DID, AND THEY WERE ALSO SUPER FAST AND EFFICIENT. I WILL DEFINITELY USE YOUR COMPANY AGAIN, AND RECOMMEND TO FRIENDS BECAUSE OF HOW WELL THESE THREE GUYS DID. THANK YOU SO MUCH!

name: connie hartley
text: DEVON AND BRYAN WERE AWESOME AND WORKED HARD. GREAT PERSONALITIES, VERY PLEASANT TO BE AROUND, PATIENT WITH ME AS I FIGURED THINGS OUT! THEY SWITCHED FURNITURE IN 2 BEDROOMS ON OPPOSITE SIDES OF HOUSE WHICH INCLUDED A VERY LARGE FAMILY HEIRLOOM, KING BED, CRIB TAKEN APART & PUT BACK TOGETHER. SEVERAL CHEST, DRESSERS, CHAIRS AND MORE. PLUS BROUGHT 8 PACKED BOXES DOWN STAIRS ALL WITHIN 2 HOURS. WILL USE AGAIN😊

name: Spotted Turkey
text: The movers were going personable, patient and professional. Truly lived up to the acronym!!!

name: scott ferguson
text: Hard to do business with a company that doesn’t call you back

name: Jessica Johnson
text: The payment method I used wasnt accepted we manage to work it out. Thank You

name: Sarah Smith-Mohan
text: I had to call College Hunks Hauling Junk last minute after another Junk removal service had canceled on me because their trucks were full. The man who set up my appointment for College Hunks was very nice and made me feel like a priority. The Hunks came first thing on a Sunday morning. They called me 30 minutes ahead of their arrival, like they said they would.  The two Hunks were friendly and polite.  They worked fast and efficiently.  All my Junk was gone in a flash at a reasonable price.  I am very happy with their service.  I’ll only use College Hunks in the future.

name: Diana Lopez
text:
College Hunks these guys were fantastic. They were on time and very neat and courteous. They took care of all my personal and fragile belongings with no problems. They delivered my Furnishings from Alabama to Albuquerque New Mexico and everything arrived in perfect condition. I would recommend this company to anybody who cherishes there personal moving items. Thank you college hunks....
Respectfully Diana Auffant

name: Nathan Grimes
text: Outstanding service, attention to detail and professional in all facets.  The personal touch- was notified of any changes to my scheduled time.  Many moves in the past being in the military, this crew cared.  Most definitely recommend

name: Steven Mccornack
text: Called College Hunks to have them come clean out packing materials from our basement (an entire truckload of boxes, wrapping plastic, and styrofoam).  They were super professional, and FAST!  They left the basement CLEAN, whereas just an hour earlier it had looked like a landfill.  FANTASTIC service.  Thanks guys!

name: Chiquita Rudolph
text: The same-day service provided was great! Walter and Tyler called ahead to let me know they were on their way. They were polite, worked quickly, and cleaned excess debris when they were done. I’ll happily recommend this company to family and friends.

name: Jennifer
text: After setting up an appointment for an estimate, my husband, who works overnights, stayed up later into the morning in order to meet someone. There was NO phone call, NO show, and NO remorse when I called to get an explanation. When I asked for a manager to see what happened and why there was no phone call or any response, the call center rep, Bernard, assured me that a manager would call me back and they would go ahead and reschedule my appointment and someone would call me 30 minutes prior to arrival. Of course, I told him I wasn't rescheduling ANYTHING until I spoke with a manager and still have had no response. Even after another call where I left a message, there is still no response. It seems apparent that making the move "stress free" is the last thing on their minds and managers also don't seem concerned with making or losing new clients either.

name: Libby Loveless
text: Great experience getting rid of some large items that no other junk removal services would take. Kind and hardworking guys! Recommend.

name: Natalie Herrera
text: I the Hunks to move me from Birmingham to Alabaster. Wipe it went a little over quote they kept me informed and I felt like part of the team. Unfortunately the truck was too big to fit down the drive way at my new house. Thank you Garrett and Jerome they were awesome!!!

name: Lillian Whitley
text: They are the best. I had some heavy furniture and they also put my bed together. I had three guys helping they are friendly, courteous and very helpful in placing my things where I needed them to be. I recommend them highly and will use them again pretty soon for junk removal when ready.

name: Kara Ann
text: Tyler and Mario came to my apartment to pick up a few things to take to a donation center. I received a call the night before to confirm the appointment, and again 30 minutes before they got there! They were probably in and out in about 30 minutes!! They were super helpful and very careful not to scrape the walls. Ive used several different moving companies before, but Mario and Tyler were by the friendliest and quickest! I will never use anyone else EXCEPT College Hunks Hauling Junk!

name: Markedia Stafford
text:
If you are looking for reliable, these are NOT your guys.

Movers called two hours before my scheduled appointment to cancel. Next available appointment they offered was 3 days later.

Scheduled appointment was on a Friday, which is much too busy to schedule any other movers. This left me totally screwed.

The caller didn't even bother to apologize or offer any sympathy. Very poor customer service.

name: Micah Colley
text: I called this past Saturday around noon to inquire about the availability of a crew to haul off an appliance for me. Von and Tyler were in my driveway 2 hours later. They were professional and courteous and provided hassle free, AFFORDABLE service. I highly recommend these guys!

name: Kyle McDermott
text:
The movers were courteous, kind, and very quick. They get 5 Stars.

4 Stars given because I was unaware that there was a after hours charge of $100, otherwise I would have booked my service much earlier in the day. The movers were able to drop it down a bit, but still shouldn't be told the exact second they show up about it.

Would use them again. Just not after 5pm.

name: Douglas Burnette
text: We were really in a bind. On short notice we needed to empty our Mother's house with 60+ years of accumulated stuff. The Hunks showed up on time and were exceedingly polite and efficient. It took two days to finish the job but Tanner, DJ, Quincy, Marcus and Devaun did a fantastic job and we are very grateful to them. The more accurately you can estimate the amount of stuff you need hauled the better off you will be. I recommend their service without reservation.

name: Courtney Harper
text: The guys were polite and did a great job maneuvering large pieces downstairs and through the house and to the next location. They took care not to scratch the ceiling or floors. Our experience was great. Thank you!

name: Megan Eerqbist
text: These guys came out to remove a pile of trash from my curb that the city would not pick up. Connor and Jacob were very nice and thoughtful as the swept the street with a broom and dust pan to ensure nothing was left behind. The whole ordeal could not have taken more than a half hour iIwas back to work before my lunch was over.

name: Pamela Crowe
text: I want to say Thank You to Tyler and Vaughn (hope I got their names right).  They came and took all my big junk away, including a mattress set,  entertainment center, and even an old water heater. They worked quickly and efficiently, cleaning up everything as they went.  They were polite and professional. Now I finally feel like I can get the rest of the work done.  Thanks, guys!

name: laura silva
text: Had an awesome experience with this company. Guys showed up on time and took great care of my stuff. Would definitely recommend and will use their service again!

name: Mary Elizabeth Neal
text: Great crew of hard-working young men. Our quoted 12 hour move was finished in 9, and all our belongings were handled with care. Great overall experience and I will recommend in the future!

name: Zack D
text: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!! I saw the bad reviews but they were the most affordable so I thought I would give them a chance and now I’m paying for it. You get what you pay for, right?! They were schedule for 9:30 but they say they have a one hour window, that’s fine but they didn’t show up for over an hour and a half! They called and said it would be 30 more minutes because they got lost and it ended up being right at an hour!!!!!! They showed up, looked at what they had to move, told me to sign something without explaining it to me and I asked what it was and they mumbled, “you can read it.” One guy made the comment to the other they didn’t have enough pads, right in front of us then had to ask us for supplies. Luckily we are in the middle of moving so we had tape but what would they have done if we didn’t?! I moved what I could to speed up the process because they were sooooo slow, seemed like it was the first time they had moved something. FINALLY, they got everything moved and my husband told them to follow him so they wouldn’t get lost again. Where my husband took a right, they kept going straight and didn’t show up for another 15 minutes when the other way is only 2-3 minutes longer. I called them to ask if they got lost again and wait for it...... THEY STOPPED ON MY WATCH TO GO EAT LUNCH! You don’t show up late when my entire day consist of this then stop and get food on my watch, guess what I haven’t eaten either! I called and spoke with the manager and he took $50 off the travel fee but I’m still not satisfied. When you call and speak with the company they tell you how professional the movers are, how they will come in and assess the home and go over a price with you beforehand, blah blah blah! None of that happened! They have completely ruined our day, our first day in our new home and I hope no one else has to deal with this!

name: Shelby Davis

text:
Birningham team:
Deon
Von
Ross
Quincy
Their service and professionalism were excellent. We have a large family and they worked very hard to get our things not our new home. I will definitely use them again and recommend them to all of our friends.

name: Ed Whatley
text: The two guys that CHHJ sent were courteous and very helpful.  They were 2 hours early and got done in about 15 minutes.  Very good experience and we will definitely use them again in the future.

name: Christy Harrington
text: Prompt and on time! Great company to do business with, the gentlemen were professional and dressed in company logo shirts. They worked hard and quickly to get the task at hand completed. I will recommend them and there service.

name: Storme Patterson
text: Mike and Tyler did great and efficient work. They were hardworking, personable, and careful to not hit any walls or doors. Would recommend.

name: Dexter Thompson
text: Great experience with the Hunks. I scheduled a move TWO days before and they came through. Showed up on time and was easy to work with. Would recommend to anybody. Ask for Pierce and Henrik.

name: Emily Dawn Taylor
text: The hunks were very friendly and professional. made me feel very comfortable with them moving my life.  I will definitely be reccomending them to anyone in need of the hunks services.

name: Jennifer Jacobson
text: We had a bunch of stuff that needed to be hauled off and called College Hunks Hauling Junk after spotting one of their trucks in our area. Quincy and Bengie called before they arrived, were polite, friendly, professional, hard-working, and super to do business with. They checked out what needed to go, and I handled some brief paperwork while they got to work taking out the junk. We happily recommend this franchise and these two young men. I'm sure we'll be using them again.

text:
I booked an appointment for 8-9am. They Arrived at 10am.
The two young men that came out to move my stuff worked hard. I asked for the truck fee be be waived (89.00)and I would pay the labor fee. The manager could not waive this fee so I asked for the owner. She did not want to compensate me properly for my time away from work. It was clearly the fault of the empolyee's the night before. So DO NOT except the OWNER to compensate you if something goes wrong.

text: Made an appointment with them and tried to call back however because I didn't have my zip code on me, it still wouldn't allow me to speak with a representative and transferred me to homeadvisor. Absolute Garbage service on the phones

name: Jason Deeney
text:
** be wary of all the fake reviews on here, obviously this is just the owners and workers making fake emails to put reviews up and hide the real reviews.  Very strange that almost all of their five-star reviews are from people who only have one review written.  Usually if someone is going to take the time to write a review and it’s the only one they’ve ever done it’s because of a poor job, not an awesome job***

It is funny that this company has a motto of “ how can we make your day stressfree?”  All they do is cause more stress.  The actual movers are inexperienced and I had to coach them through the process of getting the couch through a doorway.  The first day of the move they kept me waiting six hours before they got there and the second day they were four hours late.  Management is of no help, neither are the owners.  The guys who did the move were friendly, but sometimes that is not enough.  I hired this company to pack the apartment and move it downstairs in the same building, I ended up having to pack and move almost everything by myself.  The only thing the movers ended up moving where the pieces that were too large for me to do by myself.  In fact, I had to hire a random Uber driver to help move things so I can get out an hour early to make my flight which the owner and manager is new prior to the move, but did not care.  They talk a good game, but cannot walk the walk.  Be wary of all these excellent reviews, if you look on Yelp you will see true reviews.  I would recommend any other company in the world over this one.  The only thing the movers brought was one dolly and one screwdriver.  My next stop is to file a complaint with the better business bureau.

name: D bros
text: College Hunks helped me move out of my place and they did a great job! Sean and the rest of the crew were very friendly and helpful. I definitely recommend them for your next move.

name: Judy Ping
text:
Had a ton of garbage out on roadside from a rental house. Got a
Notice from the city on the door the next day that we would be fined if it was not removed. Called ALL my friends, who was either to busy or couldn't help for other reasons. Put in on social media ( FB) to pay someone come to remove it. Got a call, they said they would do it for $60, I said Great! Come on. While waiting for them got a text saying they made a mistake it will be $80. I was wary, but I said ok. 30 min later a text said $100. I was tired of playing their game. Called College Hunks Hauling Junk, they were there same day, reasonable price and super professional! I highly recommend them.

text: Tyler and Vaughan helped us clear junk from our storage area and they did a great job. They worked as quickly as they could given the large amount of junk that needed to be moved. They were polite and respectiful of me and all the other employees they encountered.

name: Julie Gafnea
text: I booked them to help me move into my first home over the weekend. I booked an itemized job consisting of all the large items that I could not move myself. My appointment window began with no call from them, which I found odd. I called the main number to get an ETA, but no one ever called me, despite an assurance by the rep. that they would. Another hour or so went by. I called again and was again assured that I would get a call with an ETA. Then, my appointment time passed completely. I called a third time and was told that there was nothing they could do and that the manager was not responding to any calls. So, I call the worker that called the night before to confirm my appointment. The worker picked up and proceeded to have an extremely unprofessional conversation with me about how he and his fellow worker were overbooked, and how they only have three trucks, and that he was still working at another job, and he was way on the other side of the county, and then refused to give me any sort of ETA (basically, he'll be here when he gets here). All the while, the other worker is repeatedly screaming "tell her to call customer service" in a rude tone in the background! Over an hour goes by after that, it was dark and cold by then, so I finally called and told them don't bother, if they even intended to ever come. So, after everything, I was left without several pieces of my furniture, including my bed, dresser, and chest of drawers. Now, I am just waiting until next weekend, until I can get another company to come out and help. Needless to say, I would not recommend this company to anyone.

text: Drivers were 6 hours late initially. It was like pulling teeth to get anyone on the phone, I couldn't reach anyone from the franchise until they were already 2 hours late. It took them 3 hours to make a 2 hour drive. The unloading only took 3 hours. The guys that unloaded the truck actually did their job. They were very surprised it took the other movers so long to load the truck. The co owner of the company Sean refused to talk to us. Conner, the other co owner tried to convince us that they lost money moving us. We were quoted $752, it ended up costing $1380. It was awful on my two children, we didn't even get to leave our old house until 12:15, and the movers didn't finish unpacking until 6. We could have done it faster ourselves, and we aren't

name: Jennifer Tamburello
text:
I do not like to be negative. However; when you speak and plan with the appointment people and their words of action do not happen, confidence is lost.  The appointment was for 2:00pm thru 4:00pm. The driver would call my cell 1/2 hour before arriving. This did not happen.  I called the appointment phone number at 3:15pm just to check if all still ok. She stated she could see my confirmation number for the 2-4 pick up of my donation. She stated she would call driver and have him call me. It did not happen. I called appt. # again at 4:10pm and asked was pickup to happen. He stated he would call driver no one called me that evening so I set it up for pick up on Saturday 10-12. They arrived and then 1/8 of the truck was only room for my one tv. 1/8 is $99.00.
To Load a small tv and a plastic plant would move cost $139. We did not pay the increase.
The truck was full from the day before pick ups. In defense of the two men today they were not the driver or worker from day before.
Company has too many open variables on size of load, cost to haul and failure to pick up first day or even to call us. No way to confirm you getting space paid for.  Sorry!

text: If I could rate a zero I would. My elderly mother was taken advantage of. She was charged $700 to remove items. A full truck was quoted at $499 and when it arrived it was not empty. I have filed a complaint and it has been over a week and no one has responded. I would not recommend this company to anyone.

name: Lisa Williams
text: Very unprofessional company. My original appointment was scheduled for Sunday, 9/3/2017, between 4:00 - 6:00pm. By about 5:50pm, I had not heard from anyone and decided to call to be sure my items would still be picked up. The customer service representative said she would have someone call me with an estimated time of arrival. Ben called me about 5 minutes later and stated that he and 2 other guys were on an "underestimated move job" but they should arrive to pick up my items at about 7:30pm. No one came that night or even called to tell me that I would need to reschedule! I called the next day which was Labor Day and was told by the customer service representative "Jessica" that the Birmingham office was closed due to the holiday and would reopen on Tuesday, 9/5/2017. I told her that I wanted to speak to a supervisor and she said that she would have one call me on Tuesday and she asked if I would like to reschedule my appointment for Tuesday, which I did, for a pickup between 4:30 - 6:30pm. I did not receive a call from any supervisor the next day. I called back a few hours before my pickup and talked to the customer service representative "Jessica" again. I told her I had been waiting for a call from a supervisor and she actually asked me why I needed a supervisor when my appointment had been rescheduled! I could not believe she actually asked me that question! She transferred me to supervisor/Greg Williams who didn't have much to say and lacked skills as a supervisor and appeared to have no experience in customer service. It was very bad business that no one showed up for a scheduled appointment and didn't even have the courtesy to call.

name: Jen Miles
text:
This company violates all city ordinances and are the most unprofessional people, company and services I have ever experienced. I am not a person that posts on reviews at all, this however, is warranted.

This company is supposed to pick up our complex’s garbage after 6 am in the morning. To not ramble, the management team has called and emailed this company over the past year about correcting this. My husband and I work and their trucks continuously come between 2:15 - 4:15 am. They are in violating many ordinances and their contract is going to keep going for a bit more. Nothing more to do but post this in essence to warn people of their continuing incompetence and no regard for residents, bylaws and contractual agreements.

name: Eve Engle
text: I have rented from Rumsey twice. The first time they did not give me a specific day/time of when they would retrieve my rental. They did show up, but several days later. I finally called because I was worried they would charge me extra. This time they came before 8am and I had not been notified to be there to unlock my gates. I live an hour away. I was told they would have to charge me $125 extra to come back. I waited around all day, finally to be told I would have to return the next day to let them in. I am disgusted. I do not recommend this company.

text:
Bad customer service. Dumpster was not delivered even after 3 days of told delivery date. Then they don't update you the status and then if you call them and tell them about it, they start crying and they are asking their customers to apologise for it.

It was your fault , you don't deliver the dumpster and you don't even call the customer and give update about the delivery date. And then you ask the customer for apologizing if they get angry

My friend I think customer service is an important word you are missing out .

text: Very rude employees, very overpriced.  Quoted 700.00 charged almost 1000.00. Delivered with a male private part on the side and did not even care to clean it off. When we complained about the problems was told to shut up and was hang up on.  This is after we paid of course.

3 weeks no show up to empty the garage
Every time i call they are rude and they will say we will send someone and again no one show up !!!!!

name: Trena Wise
text:
Just a warning to anyone needing a residential dumpster. Rumsey will deliver the dumpster to your house. You pay for 10 days and they will mention that you can keep it longer if needed but they will fail to tell you that they may pick up at 7 am on the 10th day regardless of the time it was dropped off. You MUST call them in advance if you want to keep it longer. They will not call you or tell you the time frame that they pickup so if your pickup date is a Monday,  better call them the prior week to schedule a longer drop off time if you need more time.

I received zero use out of my dumpster and thought I could call first thing Monday morning to have it scheduled longer but was told that it had been picked up at 7 am, didn't even get a full 10 day use out of it and spent almost $400.00. I would have been better off burning my $400.00. If you want to use their service, better make sure you ask the date of pickup and the time frame so you can make a decision if you want to keep it longer as they have very poor communication.

name: Wesley Grogan
text:
It is impossible to recommend Trey Bennett and 1-800-Got-Junk in Mobile enough. I have had to close down a large facility with only a few months notice and generated a massive amount of junk that needed to be discarded. Trey met with me, helped generate a game plan, and has stood behind his word at every moment.

His team is top-notch, works extremely hard, and is always courteous to me and the other employees. They are considerate of the facility and the other equipment, show up on time as scheduled, and always perform at the best of their ability. If you have junk that needs to be removed, Trey provides a service that takes care of all of your needs at a price that is highly competitive. Just a fantastic company all the way around.

text:
Excellent ,Quick Service! I was moving from out of town and the Homeowner I bought the new house from left a lot of junk in the garage and in the house! Plus a mattress/boxspring and old TV at the curb. I called 1-800 Got Junk and made an appointment the following morning. With in an hour the next day they  had everything cleaned up and on their truck. Everything was cleaned up and gone before my movers arrived!
The guys were so professional!
This service is worth its weight in Gold.
I will use them again .
Thanks for giving me back my piece of mind!
Michael Horton
